attributes.action: Make it illegal to drive having consumed any alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Countless lives are lost every day, week, month and year due to drink driving. It has been proved that even one drink can slow down your reaction times. Having a "sociable drink" after work e.t.c is not acceptable unless it's a soft drink. WHY RISK YOURS OR SOMEONE ELSE'S LIFE FOR ONE DRINK?????

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
